sentences.sContent: Police appealed for wit­nesses after a woman was kidnapped at gunpoint.
sentences.sCn: 一名妇女遭到持枪绑架，警方呼吁目击者挺身而出。

sentences.sContent: ...Are cities and towns less safe and kids more vulnerable to crimes like child kidnap and sexual abuse than they were in previous generations...

remMethod.val: kid(小孩) ＋ nap(小睡) → 将熟睡的小孩抱走 → 绑架， 诱拐

trans.tranOther: to take someone somewhere illegally by force, often in order to get money for returning them
